column1: I believe I can.  We start... by making a big CG building and then we have a meteor go CROSSHH!  and it, and it's all like CRAAWWWLL  a-and motorcycles burst into flame while they jump over these helicopters, right?
An eighteen-wheeler spins out of control and it's all like BROSSHH  And then this huuuge tanker full of dyna-
